metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Data Science is a combination of multiple disciplines that uses statistics, data analysis, and machine learning to analyze data and to extract knowledge and insights from it.
content.html: Data Science is a combination of multiple disciplines that uses statistics, data analysis, and machine learning to analyze data and to extract knowledge and insights from it.

content.text: Data Science is about data gathering, analysis and decision-making.
content.html: Data Science is about data gathering, analysis and decision-making.

content.text: Data Science is about finding patterns in data, through analysis, and make future predictions.
content.html: Data Science is about finding patterns in data, through analysis, and make future predictions.

content.text: Data Science is used in many industries in the world today, e.g. banking, consultancy, healthcare, and manufacturing.
content.html: Data Science is used in many industries in the world today, e.g. banking, consultancy, healthcare, and manufacturing.

content.text: A Data Scientist must find patterns within the data. Before he/she can find the patterns, he/she must organize the data in a standard format.

content.text: You will learn how to use statistics and mathematical functions to make predictions.
